title: The slums existing on reservations shall be allowed to be rehabilitated as per the provisions of the said Regulations
clause_text: The slums existing on reservations shall be allowed to be rehabilitated as per the provisions of the said Regulations. If any previous S.R.S. had been sanctioned on any reservation under the earlier provisions, such S.R.S. can be implemented further under the said Regulations, considering such land as deemed to be de-reserved as per previous sanction.
section: The Slums On Non Buildable Area / Reservations :

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
